Internal Library

Formulation Function

use @autodocs block to splice the docstrings

EGRIP.solve_restoration — Method

Solve restoration problem including the following constraints:

  • linearized AC power flow constraint
  • steady-state voltage variation constraint
  • generator cranking constraint
  • generator status and output constraint
  • load pick-up constraint
source

EGRIP._simplify_pwl_cost — Function

checks the slope of each segment in a pwl function, simplifies the function if the slope changes is below a tolerance

source

adds dcline costs, if gen costs exist

EGRIP.check_branch_directions — Method

checks that all parallel branches have the same orientation

source
EGRIP.check_branch_loops — Method

checks that all branches connect two distinct buses

source
EGRIP.check_bus_types — Method

checks bus types are consistent with generator connections, if not, fixes them

source
EGRIP.check_conductors — Method
source
EGRIP.check_connectivity — Method

checks that all buses are unique and other components link to valid buses

source
EGRIP.check_cost_functions — Method

throws warnings if cost functions are malformed

source
EGRIP.check_current_limits — Method

checks that each branch has a reasonable current rating-a, if not computes one

source
EGRIP.check_dcline_limits — Method

checks that parameters for dc lines are reasonable

source
EGRIP.check_keys — Method
source
EGRIP.check_network_data — Method

Runs various data quality checks on a PowerModels data dictionary. Applies modifications in some cases. Reports modified component ids.

source
EGRIP.check_storage_parameters — Method

checks that each storage unit has a reasonable parameters

source
EGRIP.check_thermal_limits — Method

checks that each branch has a reasonable thermal rating-a, if not computes one

source
EGRIP.check_transformer_parameters — Method

checks that each branch has a reasonable transformer parameters this is important because setting tap == 0.0 leads to NaN computations, which are hard to debug

source
EGRIP.check_type — Method

Checks if the given value is of a given type, if not tries to make it that type

source
EGRIP.check_voltage_angle_differences — Function

checks that voltage angle differences are within 90 deg., if not tightens

source
EGRIP.check_voltage_setpoints — Method

throws warnings if generator and dc line voltage setpoints are not consistent with the bus voltage setpoint

source
EGRIP.make_mixed_units — Method

Transforms network data into mixed-units (inverse of per-unit)

source
EGRIP.make_per_unit — Method

Transforms network data into per-unit

source
EGRIP.matpower_to_powermodels — Method

Converts a Matpower dict into a PowerModels dict

source
EGRIP.merge_bus_name_data — Method

merges bus name data into buses, if names exist

source
EGRIP.merge_generator_cost_data — Method

merges generator cost functions into generator data, if costs exist

source
EGRIP.merge_generic_data — Method

merges Matpower tables based on the table extension syntax

source
EGRIP.mp2pm_branch — Method

sets all branch transformer taps to 1.0, to simplify branch models

source
EGRIP.mp2pm_dcline — Method

adds pmin and pmax values at to and from buses

EGRIP.simplify_cost_terms — Method

EGRIP.split_line — Method
source
EGRIP.split_loads_shunts — Method

splitloadsshunts(data) Seperates Loads and Shunts in data under separate "load" and "shunt" keys in the PowerModels data format. Includes references to originating bus via "loadbus" and "shuntbus" keys, respectively.

source
EGRIP.type_array — Method

Attempts to determine the type of an array of strings extracted from a matlab file

source
EGRIP.type_value — Method

Attempts to determine the type of a string extracted from a matlab file
